name: Asian Riddles 2 Free
description:
Solve the riddles of the great Asian wise men again! Prove you are a truly master of griddlers!

Much more unique levels!

This puzzle game's genre also known as griddlers, picross, hanjie, nonograms, japanese crosswords, logic puzzles, pic-a-pix, nonogramme, logimage, logic art, nonogrids, japanilainen ristikko, nonogramm, kare karalamaca, nonogramas, malovane krizovky, crucipixel.

144 riddles and 12 halls for meditation!

More than 10 hours of gameplay to relaxing asian melodies.

Charming world of Asia is waiting its hero again!
